segments.text: How long does it take to get to downtown from here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What companies do we have in our neighborhood ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mitsubishi , HP , IBM and many other famous corporations .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does the 7th floor belong to our company too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , our company has two floors , the 6th and 7th floor in this building .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It â€™ s such a large firm . Do we have our own staff restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , at the end of the hall .
segments.speaker: S2
